mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carQna(qnaNum, carNum, memberIdx, secret, question, question_date, q_content) VALUES(qnaNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{carNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberIdx}, #{secret}, #{question}, SYSDATE, #{q_content})
mapper.select:
SELECT q.qnaNum, q.memberIdx, m.userName, secret, question, m2.userId answerId, q.carNum, question_date, answer_date, q_content FROM carQna q
JOIN member1 m ON q.memberIdx = m.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m2 ON q.answerId = m2.userId WHERE q.carNum = #{carNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY q.qnaNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
